It appears that this Government has decided that Blind and Partially sighted people will no longer be classed as disabled people under the new PIP point system and wish to stop their financial help that is much needed.
Visually impaired  people will lose their DLA if they are currently getting less than £120 per week which is most people with sight problems.I think this is grosely wrong and should be reconcidered.
